contentencoded:
On Wednesday, Tina Brown announced that she will be stepping down as editor-in-chief of The Daily Beast next year and starting her own company that will cover what she described as "theatrical journalism." Marketplace's Mark Garrison joins Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss. 

Click the audio player above to hear more.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, September 12, 2013

teaser: Tina Brown steps down as editor of The Daily Beast. She'll leave the magazine next year and start a new company.
title: What was Tina Brown able to do for print journalism?
description: Tina Brown steps down as editor of The Daily Beast. She'll leave the magazine next year and start a new company.
